title: Debunked: Vaccines and Infertility
label: false
summary: No evidence supports that vaccines cause infertility. The cited 'study' was misreported and had a tiny sample size.
micro_lesson: Tip: Check sample size and look for peer-reviewed replication before accepting extraordinary claims.

title: True: Major Study Confirms X Intervention Helps
label: true
summary: A large peer-reviewed meta-analysis (2022) supports the claim when measured properly.
micro_lesson: Tip: Prefer meta-analyses and peer-reviewed studies over single-sample reports.

title: Context: Old Photo Reused in New Event
label: context
summary: This photo was originally published in 2018 during an unrelated event and is now being reused with misleading captions.
micro_lesson: Tip: Reverse-search images to check first publication date and original caption.
